extends java.lang.Object

Holds data about the current transaction

detachListeners

public static TransactionListeners detachListeners()
Removes the TransactionListeners from the current transaction. The result is never null. If there were no registered listeners, or no current transaction, TransactionListeners.EMPTY is returned.

getEntry

public static CurrentTransactionData.Entry getEntry()
Returns the current entry, or null if nothing set
